phaseBanner.content: This is a new service - your feedback will help us to improve it. For more information, please restart your journey

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on GA4
cookieBanner.heading: Cookies on GA4
cookieBanner.paragraph1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookieBanner.paragraph2: We'd like to set additional cookies so we can remember your settings, understand how people use the service and make improvements.

cookieBannerAccept.paragraph1: You've accepted additional cookies. You can

cookieBannerReject.paragraph1: You've rejected additional cookies. You can

content.header: Sorry, you can not access OneLogin GOV.UK from this page
content.paragraph1: Go to the GOV.UK OneLogin homepage to find the service you need.

content.list1: Sign in to your GOV.UK One Login
content.subheading1: Sign in to your GOV.UK One Login
content.paragraph1: You can use your GOV.UK One Login to access some government services.
content.paragraph2: It does not work with all government accounts and services yet (for example Government Gateway or Universal Credit)
content.paragraph3: In the future, you'll be able to use your GOV.UK One Login to access all services on GOV.UK.
content.paragraph4: See the services you can use with GOV.UK One Login.
content.insetText: If you need a GOV.UK One Login to use a service, and you do not already have one, you'll be able to create one when you first use that service.
content.list4: change your sign in details (email address, password or how you get security codes)
content.list5: see and access the services you've used with your GOV.UK One Login
content.subheading2: Report a problem or give feedback
content.paragraph6: To report a problem with your GOV.UK One Login or give feedback,<a href="/feedback" class="govuk-link">contact the GOV.UK One Login team</a >.

pagination.text: Services you can use with GOV.UK One Login

content.printGuideLinkText: View a printable version of the whole guide

feedbackType.label: What is the type of feedback?

options.consent: Yes, I want to share my feedback with GOV.UK One Login

content.header: What would you like help with?
content.hint: Tick all that apply - this will help us understand your initial needs

options.accessIntegrationEnvironment: Getting access to the integration environment to test GOV.UK One Login

content.hint: Describe your service, what it does, who it helps and why? Also tell us if it's a new service that has not launched yet.

content.hint: This can be different to where you went before
